name: Simple RPG (Inform 7 graphics)
description:
This is a way to hack together Inform and a javascript game. 

It consists of an Inform 7 source file. When you download it and hit 'release', it creates several pages of javascript, scc, and html.

These files need to be edited; one way to do so is to download the 'download' folder and drag over all the files. In that folder is a txt file that explains exactly what changes are made between 'base' inform and this new inform. 

Please let me know if you try working on this and need help!
